Yes No Please briefly describe what your management and/or supervisory responsibilities have entailed: If you have held any other occupations in the past five years, please identify them here: What is the highest level of education you have completed? Less than high school High school graduate Some college/vocational training College graduate. If so, please indicate degree and/or field of study: Post-graduate degree. Employed full-time Employed part-time Self-employed Homemaker Unemployed/laid-off Disabled Retired Full-time student (please state area of study) Other (please describe) What is his or her occupation (or what was it, if he or she is no longer employed)? By whom is (was) he or she employed? -5- DOJ-OGR-00005327

Employed full-time Employed part-time Self-employed Homemaker Unemployed/laid-off Disabled Retired Full-time student (please state area of study) Other (please describe)
What is his or her occupation (or what was it, if he or she is no longer employed)? By whom is (was) he or she employed?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a juror questionnaire from a court case. It contains various questions about the juror's background, education, and employment status, as well as that of their spouse or significant other.
